title: Who knows?
creator_credit: Eric Fullilove, Peter Dimond and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: An open-ended training session for prison officers. Deals with a number of prisoner behavioural problems. Cast includes Bill Charlton, FranklGallacher, Rob George, John Clayton, Lloyd Cunnington, Maureen Sherlock, Barbara West, Susan Wylie.
